title: Ticket #6256: Use v2 signing for OpenStack grid resources
description:
John Hover reports that [49695] broken OpenStack compability -- even if all of AWS' regions support the v4 API, no OpenStack servers do. :(

We already know (or can find out) if the server is OpenStack, so this should just be a matter of getting that information to the GAHP. (It won't change over the lifetime of a GAHP, so we should just need to set it once after we discover the type, but it's URL-specific. We can't make it GAHP-specific because we don't know the server type until after we construct the GAHP and contact the specific URL... do we actually ever multiplex URLs to the same GAHP?)
